name: One Shot In The Chamber
description:
Note: If you are experiencing lag, would like to experience the game better or would prefer to play the game offline, there are download links below for Windows (32-bit and 64-bit), Mac and Linux

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move and Mouse to aim

Left Click to Shoot Bullet

Right Click to Summon Bullet

Space or Middle Click to Teleport To Bullet

Esc to Pause/ Resume the Game

Welcome to the One Shot In The Chamber Game Page

One Life, One Shot One Chance.

One Shot In The Chamber is a wave-based survival game made for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam which centres around the theme of "Only One". In One Shot In The Chamber, you must survive waves of enemies that will come at you relentlessly. The catch is, you have only one weapon, a single bullet. Fortunately, your bullet is magic and can be summoned back to you or teleported to. Using this ability, you must survive the onslaught of enemies that will come your way.

Feel free to play the game in your browser however, I encourage that you download the game for the best playing experience. Download links for Windows, Mac, and Linux can be found below.
